title: President urges people to remain calm & stop violence
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The President, Gotabaya Rajapaksa has appealed and urged people to remain calm and stop violence and acts of revenge against citizens, irrespective of political affiliations.
In a tweet, he stated that all efforts will be made to restore political stability through consensus, within constitutional mandate and to resolve economic crisis.
UN Human Rights Chief condemns attacks on peaceful protest, & mob violence against ruling faction
